NK006(cha)017:0: 'jam dpal rgyud lugs kyi sgrub chen skabs kyi stong thun nyer mkho bzhugs so //
NK006(cha)017:2: 'o da lam 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems
NK006(cha)017:3: dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por tshom bu tshogs kyi sgrub
NK006(cha)017:4: pa'i dga' ston chen po nyams su myong ba 'di
NK006(cha)017:5: yang phun sum tshogs pa lnga yi rang bzhin dang
NK006(cha)017:6: ldan pa ste / ji skad du /
NK006(cha)017:7: dang po phun sum tshogs ldan te //
NK006(cha)017:8: tshad phyin rab 'byams slob dpon gyis //
NK006(cha)017:9: snod dang ldan pa'i 'khor bsdus nas //
NK006(cha)017:10: gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu //
NK006(cha)017:11: sa chog rdzogs byas gnas khang ldan //
NK006(cha)017:12: dgyes pa tshang ba'i yo byad rdzogs //
NK006(cha)017:13: dus cha bzhi yi dang po la //
NK006(cha)017:14: nya zla gza' skar tshes grangs brtags /
NK006(cha)017:15: zhes phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang ldan pa ste /
NK006(cha)017:16: de yang chos kyi sku spros pa thams cad dang
NK006(cha)017:17: bral ba nam mkha' lta bu'i de bzhin nyid shin
NK006(cha)017:18: tu rnam par dag pa gzod ma nas 'od gsal
NK006(cha)017:19: ba sku dang ye shes yon tan thams cad lhun
NK006(cha)017:20: gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid brtan g.yo kun khyab 'jam
NK006(cha)017:22: thog ma dang tha ma med cing skye 'chi'i mtshan ma las ring du 'das pa ste /
NK006(cha)017:24: srid dang zhi las rnam grol zhing //
NK006(cha)017:25: yon tan rgya mtsho gnyis su med //
NK006(cha)017:26: spros pa kun las rab 'das pa'i //
NK006(cha)017:27: bcom ldan 'das ni mkha' rab zhi //
NK006(cha)017:29: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs de nyid ni 'das pa dang /
NK006(cha)017:31: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs shing bzhugs pa thams
NK006(cha)017:32: cad bskyed pas na rgyal ba thams cad kyi yab
NK006(cha)017:34: rmad byung rgyal po'i rgyud las //
NK006(cha)017:35: thog ma kun gyi sngon rol du //
NK006(cha)017:36: rang snang gzhi la mthar phyin te //
NK006(cha)017:37: sngar sangs snga nas rgyas pa'i phyir //
NK006(cha)017:38: thog ma'i kun tu bzang po ni /
NK006(cha)017:40: ces 'byung ba ltar sku gsum gyi zhing khams tshad med pa'i sprin chen rnam par bkod de //
NK006(cha)017:41: de rnams su gdul bya dang 'dul byed kyi ston
NK006(cha)017:42: pa bsam las 'das pas sangs rgyas dang byang sems
NK006(cha)017:43: / slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /
NK006(cha)017:44: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba /
NK006(cha)017:45: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor
NK006(cha)017:46: sku yi snang ba nges pa dang ma nges pa'i
NK006(cha)017:47: rnam par rol pa'i sgyu 'phrul mtha' yas pa dang
NK006(cha)017:48: / gsung gis kyang sgra tshig rang mtshan las 'das
NK006(cha)017:49: pa'i chos kyi sgra dbyangs ji snyed gdul bya'i blo
NK006(cha)017:50: yi rim pa dang mtshungs par snga phyi res 'jog
NK006(cha)017:51: ma yin par dus gcig char du rang rang gi
NK006(cha)017:52: sgra skad du snang ba dang /
NK006(cha)017:53: thugs ni ye shes chen po rgya mtsho dang /
NK006(cha)017:54: nam mkha' ltar zab cing rgya che ba las g.yo ba ma mchis kyang /
NK006(cha)017:55: sngon gyi smon lam gyi cho 'phrul chen po dang
NK006(cha)017:56: snang ba'i rtsal las mkhyen brtse nus pa'i ye shes
NK006(cha)017:57: kyi 'jug pa skad cig rer yang sems can rgya
NK006(cha)017:59: yongs su grol bar byed pa ste mdor na de
NK006(cha)017:60: bzhin gshegs pa'ajama dpal kyi sku yi ba spu'i khung
NK006(cha)017:61: bu re re yang zhing bsam kyis mi khyab pa'i
NK006(cha)017:62: rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK006(cha)017:63: bdag nyid du bzhugs pa ste /
NK006(cha)017:65: nam mkha' ji snyed khyab gyur pa //
NK006(cha)017:66: sku yis kyang ni de snyed khyab /
NK006(cha)017:67: sku yis ji snyed khyab gyur pa /
NK006(cha)017:68: 'od kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab /
NK006(cha)017:69: 'od kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa //
NK006(cha)017:70: gsung gis kyang ni de snyed khyab //
NK006(cha)017:71: gsung gis ji snyed khyab gyur pa //
NK006(cha)017:72: thugs kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab //
NK006(cha)017:74: sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las /
NK006(cha)017:75: spu yi rtse mo gcig la yang //
NK006(cha)017:76: zhing rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab //
NK006(cha)017:77: sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha dad de //
NK006(cha)017:78: de dag 'dres par gyur pa med //
NK006(cha)017:79: ces gsungs pa ltar sku gsung thugs yon tan mi
NK006(cha)017:80: zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i yonatana thams cad yongs
NK006(cha)017:81: su rdzogs shing sgrib gsum las rnam par grol ba
NK006(cha)017:82: dri ma med pa'i sku pad+ma ltar dag cing gtsang
NK006(cha)017:83: ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang spyod yul
NK006(cha)017:84: ro gcig tu mnyam pa sku gsum dbyer mi phyed
NK006(cha)017:85: pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
NK006(cha)017:86: las 'das pa thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa
NK006(cha)017:88: phas kyi rgol ba thams kyis kun tu tshugs pa med cing /
NK006(cha)017:89: gsang ba gsum gyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer bye
NK006(cha)017:90: ba 'bum gyi phreng bas mdzes shing blta na sdug
NK006(cha)017:91: pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon
NK006(cha)017:92: pa / thabs la mkhas pa'i phrin las kyi mthu
NK006(cha)017:93: dpag tu med par rgyal ba rnams kyis 'gran du
NK006(cha)017:94: mi bzod cing dkyil 'khor rab 'byams kyi spro bsdu'i
NK006(cha)017:95: bdag po khyab bdag 'jam dpal rdo rje nyid rigs
NK006(cha)017:96: brgya'i sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba chen po dkyil 'khor gcig
NK006(cha)017:97: tu bsdus pa gsang chenarigasa gcig tu sgrub pa'i thabs
NK006(cha)017:98: tshul ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste /
NK006(cha)017:99: de yang gnas phun sum tshogs pa bskal pa bzang
NK006(cha)017:100: po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gang du mngon par byang
NK006(cha)017:101: chub pa'i gnas ri rab lhun po'i lho phyogs dzam
NK006(cha)017:102: bu'i dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing gi byang phyogs kha
NK006(cha)017:103: ba can zhes pa'i nang gses snying rje'i gter chen
NK006(cha)017:104: lha mchog gangasari'i mdangs ldan gyis phyag mtshan du bzhes
NK006(cha)017:105: pa'i yul dbus lha ldan gru 'dzin gyi nyin byed
NK006(cha)017:106: dbang po 'char ba'i shar phyogs dwangs bsil gyi ri
NK006(cha)017:107: bo rtse mo lnga pa zhes lha dang drang srong
NK006(cha)017:108: grub pa'i tshogs kyis bsten pa blo gter rdo rje
NK006(cha)017:109: rnon po'i ye shes kyi sku yi cha shas gcig
NK006(cha)017:110: ni gnas de na rtag tu dgyes shing rol pa
NK006(cha)017:111: gang gi sku yi 'od zer dmar ser li khri'i
NK006(cha)017:112: rdul brtsegs kyi phung po dang //
NK006(cha)017:113: de'i thod nas snang byed bdag po 'char kha'i mdangs
NK006(cha)017:114: dang 'grogs te nub phyogs bde ldan bod dang bod
NK006(cha)017:115: chen ljongs su rtag tu khyab pa'i thugs rjes 'atsha
NK006(cha)017:116: ba las mi rnams dge bcur spyod cing rang bzhin
NK006(cha)017:117: bzang ba can du gnas pa'i bod chen sa yi
NK006(cha)017:118: thig le rigs gsum sprul pa'i zhing khams 'phags pa
NK006(cha)017:119: 'jam dpal nyid mi yi sha tshugs su snang ba
NK006(cha)017:120: bde gshegs spobs pa mtha' yas dgyes pa'i grub ri
NK006(cha)017:121: gnyis pa 'og min kathog rdo rje gdan zhes gtsug
NK006(cha)017:122: lag gi gzhung nas bstan pa'i sa yi dpyad ma
NK006(cha)017:125: zur brgyad la sogs rtse mang dang //
NK006(cha)017:126: chu bo bzhin tu ma pho zhing //
NK006(cha)017:127: mnyam zhing yid 'ong kha ya chu //
NK006(cha)017:128: nyi ma shin tu gnas pa ni //
NK006(cha)017:129: nam mkha' mtshan nyid shes par bya //
NK006(cha)017:130: mtho dang 'dud pa nub byang yin //
NK006(cha)017:131: shar lho gzhol zhing 'jam pa la //
NK006(cha)017:132: tha sgro grog mod chu sna tshogs //
NK006(cha)017:133: dal dbang sgra yi mtshams brtag bya //
NK006(cha)017:134: lhun sdug ri bo nags tshal ldan //
NK006(cha)017:135: rab tu 'jam zhing snum bag can //
NK006(cha)017:136: chu bo dbang gi phyogs yin te //
NK006(cha)017:137: cung zad kyis ni rlung nyung zhing //
NK006(cha)017:138: me tog shing tshal bya skad brtag /
NK006(cha)017:139: lo rgyus shes pa'ang mchog tu gsungs //
NK006(cha)017:140: bdag nyid brtags shing nyams dga' dang //
NK006(cha)017:141: bsam gtan dgra las ring gyur pa //
NK006(cha)017:142: rang khyim la sogs de bzhin te /
NK006(cha)017:143: nan tan nus mthu ldan phyir yin //
NK006(cha)017:145: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su tshang ba lags /
NK006(cha)017:146: nam zhig sgrub pa'i dusakya khyad par la //
NK006(cha)017:148: dus ni yar ngo'i brgyad la brtsams //
NK006(cha)017:149: shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la //
NK006(cha)017:150: byang chub spyod pa cher spyod pas //
NK006(cha)017:151: gsung mchog dngos grub thob bya'i phyir //
NK006(cha)017:152: gza' skar shes pa'ang blang bar bya //
NK006(cha)017:153: zhes gsungs pa ltar rta bdun dbang po khyu mchog
NK006(cha)017:154: gi khyim du bskyed cing rgyu skar gyi lha mo
NK006(cha)017:155: sa gas nya ba'i zla ba /
NK006(cha)017:156: bdag cag gi ston pa nyid sku bltams pa dang mngon par byang chub pa dang /
NK006(cha)017:157: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste rgyal ba'i
NK006(cha)017:158: dus chen gsum 'dzom dang khyad par 'jam dpal dbyangs
NK006(cha)017:159: nyid snyigs ma rtsod pa rgyas pa'i dus su lta
NK006(cha)017:160: ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing sel bar byed pa la
NK006(cha)017:161: bsam bzhin byon pa kun mkhyen mi pham phyogs las
NK006(cha)017:162: rnam par rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho zhes mtshan gya snyan
NK006(cha)017:163: pa phyogs bcur rgya sa pa de nyid 'jam dpal
NK006(cha)017:164: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs klong du thim pa'i dmar
NK006(cha)017:165: phyogs kyi dus dang tshes bzang por rjes dran gyi
NK006(cha)017:167: mchod pa thams cad yongs spangs nas //
NK006(cha)017:168: bla ma mchod pa yang dag brtsams //
NK006(cha)017:169: de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen gyi //
NK006(cha)017:170: ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
NK006(cha)017:172: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bas //
NK006(cha)017:173: bla ma'i ba spu khung gcig mchog //
NK006(cha)017:174: zhes sogs bsod nams tshad med pa'i 'jug ngogs dam par gyur pa'o //
NK006(cha)017:175: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni //
NK006(cha)017:177: spyi dang 'dren pa dam tshig dang //
NK006(cha)017:178: nyams chags skong dang shes rgyud grol //
NK006(cha)017:179: man ngag lung gi slob dpon rnams //
NK006(cha)017:180: zhes pa ltar kun gyis dam par bkur zhing bka'
NK006(cha)017:181: drin thob pa spyi yi bla ma chos sgor 'dren
NK006(cha)017:182: pa'i slob dpon shes rgyud grol ba /
NK006(cha)017:183: man ngag ston cing lung 'bog pa /
NK006(cha)017:184: nyams chags skong ba'i bla ma /
NK006(cha)017:185: dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon ste /
NK006(cha)017:186: de yang dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon ni /
NK006(cha)017:188: mkhas shing bya ba bral ba dang //
NK006(cha)017:189: chos nyid don la tshad phebs dang //
NK006(cha)017:190: 'dod pa'i don la rmongs pa med //
NK006(cha)017:191: gsang sngags bla ma'i mtshan nyid do //
NK006(cha)017:192: zhes pa ltar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ston
NK006(cha)017:193: pa rdo rje rgyal po nyid dgongs pa chos nyid
NK006(cha)017:194: las mi g.yo bzhin du thugs rje'i phrin las tshad
NK006(cha)017:195: med pas gang 'dul 'gro ba'i don sgrub pa la
NK006(cha)017:196: thogs pa mi mnga' zhing mkhyen brtse nus pa'i yon
NK006(cha)017:197: tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs
NK006(cha)017:198: pa'o // 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang dad pa
NK006(cha)017:199: dang brtson 'grus lan zhing shes rab dang dbang po
NK006(cha)017:200: gsal ba mkhas shing yid gzhungs pa /
NK006(cha)017:202: phyi sor thar gyi ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan brtan pa /
NK006(cha)017:203: nang du gzhan phan byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsis gtams pa /
NK006(cha)017:204: gsang ba zab mo'i dbang thob cing bskyed rdzogs kyi
NK006(cha)017:205: don la gnas shing sdom pa dang dam tshig la
NK006(cha)017:206: brtson pa sgrub pa'i man ngag la mkhas pa dbang
NK006(cha)017:207: thob pa'i rdo rje slob dpon la gus pa dang
NK006(cha)017:208: ldan zhing bsnyen bkur la brtson pa ste /
NK006(cha)017:210: dad dang snying rjes sems rab dul //
NK006(cha)017:211: sngags kyi lam mchog don gnyer pa //
NK006(cha)017:212: zhes 'byung ba ltar gyis mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i
NK006(cha)017:213: 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs rdo rje rig pa 'dzin
NK006(cha)017:214: pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba lags //
NK006(cha)017:215: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi rim pa phun sum tshogs pa yang //
NK006(cha)017:216: theg pa thams cad kyi rtse rgyal /
NK006(cha)017:218: bstan thams cad kyi nying khu //
NK006(cha)017:219: rig 'dzin grub thob rnams kyi dgongs pa'i zhe phug /
NK006(cha)017:220: ye shes kyi d+aa ki ma rnams kyi snying khrag 'jam dpal rdzogs pa chen po //
NK006(cha)017:221: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgyud kyi bstan don //
NK006(cha)017:222: ma h+aa ku ru pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi thugs kyi
NK006(cha)017:223: nying khu tshe gcig la 'pho chen rdo rje'i sku
NK006(cha)017:224: brnyes par byed pa'i nyams len byin rlabs kyi drod
NK006(cha)017:225: tshad ma nyams shing d+aa k+aa'i zhal rlangs dang ldan
NK006(cha)017:226: pa nyid rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes kyis brgyan
NK006(cha)017:227: te spros bcas dang 'brel ba tshom bu tshogs su
NK006(cha)017:231: 'tsho ba yo byad mtha' gnyis su ma lhung ba /
NK006(cha)017:232: dngos grub kyi rdzas tshang zhing nyams pa med pa /
NK006(cha)017:233: dam tshig gi rdzas tshang shing brten du yod pa
NK006(cha)017:234: dngos grub sgrub pa'i rten skongs mchod pa'i yo byad
NK006(cha)017:235: sogs ma tshang ba med pas sgrub pa'i las rim
NK006(cha)017:236: kyang dang por sa yi cho ga dang /
NK006(cha)017:237: nub gnyis pa sta gon gyi rim pa rnams sngon
NK006(cha)017:238: du legs par grub nas rgyan bkram nas sgrub pa
NK006(cha)017:239: po gnas su bkod pa skabs su babs pa ste
NK006(cha)017:240: / de yang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'tshob //
NK006(cha)017:241: ston pa rdo rje rgyal po dang /
NK006(cha)017:242: phrin las rnam bzhir dbang 'byor dam chos char 'bebs rdo rje rgyal tshab /
NK006(cha)017:243: yab kyi dgyes skyed rdo rje yum chen /
NK006(cha)017:244: phrin las gzhung srong rdo rje karma bar chad 'dul ba'i rdo rje mtshams pa /
NK006(cha)017:245: drod tshad 'dzin pa'i rdo rje spyan pa /
NK006(cha)017:246: bgegs bskrad pa'i rdo rje ging chen /
NK006(cha)017:247: dus tshod 'dzin pa rdo rje dus mtshams /
NK006(cha)017:248: g.yo bskol gyi las la mkhas pa'i rdo rje phyag tshang /
NK006(cha)017:249: dam tshig che zhing brtse gdung che ba'i rdo rje byan po /
NK006(cha)017:250: gtsang sbra che zhing rtag tu bka' sgrub rdo rje
NK006(cha)017:251: rdul phyag pa rnams rang rang gi lta dgongs ting
NK006(cha)017:252: nge 'dzin dang las de dang de sgrub pa la
NK006(cha)017:253: gzhol ba'i thugs kyi 'dun pa rtse gcig pas tshig
NK006(cha)017:254: 'di rnams kyis rjes zlos mdzad par zhu /
NK006(cha)017:255: ma tram bsgral chog skabs la /
NK006(cha)017:257: da la la sngon byung gi ston pa'i rnam thar
NK006(cha)017:258: rjes 'jug nyams len gyi tshul du ma tram bsgral
NK006(cha)017:259: ba'i cho ga bgyi pa la /
NK006(cha)017:261: shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la //
NK006(cha)017:262: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
NK006(cha)017:263: shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las //
NK006(cha)017:264: khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad /
NK006(cha)017:265: ces pa ltar chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las snying
NK006(cha)017:266: rje ngang gis khros pas gdul bya gdug pa can
NK006(cha)017:267: 'dul ba ste // de yang sngon bskal pa kun
NK006(cha)017:268: dga' zhes bya bar gsang sngags kyi lta spyod las
NK006(cha)017:269: log par gol pa'i ru dra thar pa nag po
NK006(cha)017:270: 'jig rten du byung ba sngon gyi smon lam drag
NK006(cha)017:271: po dang gsang sngags spyad nyes pa'i mthu btsan pos
NK006(cha)017:272: stobs dang ldan par gyur te gzugs khams man chad
NK006(cha)017:273: dbang du bsdus pa na gsang ba'i bdag po dpal
NK006(cha)017:274: chen por sprul te btul zhing khog pa gzhal yas
NK006(cha)017:276: yan lag don khrol rnams dur khrod brgyad du bkod par mdzad pa dang /
NK006(cha)017:277: yang 'jal dpal nyid khro bo thams cad kyi rje
NK006(cha)017:278: btsun gshin rje gshed po'i skur bstan nas lho phyogs
NK006(cha)017:279: sa 'og rim dgu'i thod pa lcags kyi grong khyer
NK006(cha)017:280: na gnas pa'i gshin rje'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa
NK006(cha)017:281: btul ba dang de dag kyang bstan par srung bar
NK006(cha)017:282: bskos shing 'khor rnams bran dang 'bangs du bkol /
NK006(cha)017:283: chas rnams he ru ka chen pos rgyal byed dpa'
NK006(cha)017:284: rtags kyis tshul du bzhes pa dang mthun par deng
NK006(cha)017:285: 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyis kyang gsang bar mchog
NK006(cha)017:286: gi gzhal med khang chen por gdod nas grub pa
NK006(cha)017:287: la slar yang byin gyis rlabs shing sgrub pa'i gzhi
NK006(cha)017:288: bkod pa la dgongs pa mi 'gyur ba'i gzer dang
NK006(cha)017:289: / yi dam lha yi nga rgyal brtan pos ma tram bsgral ba'i las rim la 'jug par zhu /
NK006(cha)017:291: da lam sgrub pa po rnams ye nas rang bzhin rnam par dag pa lha yi dkyil 'khor ste //
NK006(cha)017:294: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis med pa'o //
NK006(cha)017:297: rdo rje phur pa'i yan lag ni //
NK006(cha)017:298: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
NK006(cha)017:299: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
NK006(cha)017:300: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
NK006(cha)017:302: gdod nas rang bzhin lhun grub tu gnas pa de
NK006(cha)017:303: nyid mngon du byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ma
NK006(cha)017:304: dag pa'i snang ba thams cad ye shes kyi 'khor
NK006(cha)017:305: lo sdom pa ni gsang sngags kyi lam gyi srog
NK006(cha)017:307: de dang mthun pa'i lha yi rnam pa dang //
NK006(cha)017:308: mos pa lam byed kyi tshul du rgyan dang chas gos kyis mnga' gsol ba la /
NK006(cha)017:309: ngo tsha dang khrel yod kyi rtags su stod g.yogs smad g.yogs /
NK006(cha)017:310: nang gi de nyid bsgrod pas sa yi rtse mor
NK006(cha)017:311: son pa'i rtags su gtsug tor nor bu'i tog can
NK006(cha)017:312: / tshogs brgyad gnas su dag pa'i brdar rin po che'i rgyan brgyad dang /
NK006(cha)017:313: pha rol phyin drug rdzogs pa'i rtags su rus rgyan
NK006(cha)017:314: drug ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga
NK006(cha)017:315: / nyon mongs dug gsum 'joms pa'i kha t+aam /
NK006(cha)017:316: bde ba chen po mtshon pa'i rtags thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba /
NK006(cha)017:317: mi shes 'joms pa'i ral gri shes bya rab 'byams
NK006(cha)017:318: mkhyen pa'i rtags su glegs bam thabs shes mtshon pa'i
NK006(cha)017:319: mda' gzhu / mi 'jigs pa mtshon pa'i seng khri /
NK006(cha)017:320: 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos pa'i rtags gdan pad+ma /
NK006(cha)017:321: khams dkar dmar dag pa'i rtags nyi zla //
NK006(cha)017:322: 'od dang gzi brjid sred med kyi bus kyang mi
NK006(cha)017:323: phigs pa'i go cha sra ba'i gos dang gsung yi
NK006(cha)017:324: ge'i 'khor lor 'gyur zhing chos thams cad gzhom med
NK006(cha)017:325: rdo rje na da'i rang sgrar shar ba'i rtags ak+sha
NK006(cha)017:326: lnga bcu skye 'chi bgres rgud spangs pa'i rtags tshe
NK006(cha)017:327: yi bum pa rnams kyis mnga' gsol bas mtshan dang
NK006(cha)017:329: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i thugs mos dang bcas rjes zlos gnang bar zhu //
NK006(cha)017:331: 'o da lam phun sum tshogs pa lnga yis sgrub pa'i gzhi bzung /
NK006(cha)017:332: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi yis khog phub /
NK006(cha)017:333: mtha' rgyas dngos grub blangs shing rjes kyi bya ba
NK006(cha)017:334: rnams legs byas dge tshogs rnams bla na med pa'i
NK006(cha)017:335: byang chub tu bsngo zhing ston pa rdo rje rgyal
NK006(cha)017:337: bdag gzhan dkyil 'khor 'dir 'tshogs pa thams cad rdo
NK006(cha)017:338: rje'i rigs gcig tu byas te tshom bu gcig tu
NK006(cha)017:339: 'tshogs shing mi 'abralaba'i phyir mar me'i smon lam gdab
NK006(cha)017:340: pa skabs su bab pa yin /
NK006(cha)017:341: de yang sgrub pa zab mo 'di ni 'phags pa
NK006(cha)017:342: 'jam dpal gyi rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las
NK006(cha)017:343: zur du bkol ba bstod pa glu blangs kyi le'u
NK006(cha)017:344: zhes kyang grags / don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag
NK006(cha)017:345: par brjod pa 'di ni bstan pa thams cad la
NK006(cha)017:346: khyab cing rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku
NK006(cha)017:348: khyad par du gnyis med a ti yo ga'i rgyud
NK006(cha)017:349: kyi rgyal po chen po la 'phags yul du slob
NK006(cha)017:350: dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs
NK006(cha)017:351: / rigs ldan 'jam dpal grags pa rnams kyis rgyud 'grel sgrub thabs rgya cher bkral ba las /
NK006(cha)017:353: slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje /
NK006(cha)017:354: pan chen dri med bshes gnyen /
NK006(cha)017:355: o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas rnams kyis rdzogs pa chen
NK006(cha)017:356: po ltar bkral zhing rgyud sgrub thabs su bsdebs par
NK006(cha)017:357: mdzad pa ste / de yang gdod ma'i dbyings su
NK006(cha)017:358: rang rig ye nas sangs rgyas pa 'jam dpal kun
NK006(cha)017:359: tu bzang po nyid rang gdangs 'jam dpal rigs lnga'i
NK006(cha)017:360: rnam par bzhengs pa'i byin rlabs dgongs pa'i chu bo
NK006(cha)017:361: rig 'dzin dga' rab rdo rje la sogs sprul pa'i
NK006(cha)017:362: sku mchog rnams la brda' tsam gyis brgyud pa las
NK006(cha)017:363: mdzad pa ste / / 'dir ni slob dpon chen
NK006(cha)017:364: po 'jam dpal gshes gnyen zhes 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi
NK006(cha)017:365: ye shes kyi skus dngos su rjes su bzung ba'i
NK006(cha)017:366: rig 'dzin chen po des slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo
NK006(cha)017:367: rje dang sh+r+aii sing ha gnyis la bshad sgrub kyi
NK006(cha)017:368: bka' srol 'byed pa'i tshul du gtad pas phyag rgya
NK006(cha)017:369: chen po mchog gi dngos grub brnyes shing rig 'dzin
NK006(cha)017:370: mdzad pa ste / / sh+r+ai sing has // sprul pa'i sku pad+ma 'byung gnas /
NK006(cha)017:371: pan chen bi ma mi tra /
NK006(cha)017:372: lo chen be ro ts+aa na gsum la gnang ba las /
NK006(cha)017:373: bi ma las snying po bcud dril gnas brtan ldang ma lhun rgyal dang /
NK006(cha)017:374: rgyal sras rdo rje gling po'i gter byon kyang yod
NK006(cha)017:375: la bod yul 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo 'jam
NK006(cha)017:376: dpal dbyangs nyid kyi ye shes sgyu 'phrul d+r+aa ba'i
NK006(cha)017:377: snang cha rig 'dzin rgyal por shar ba dpal ldan
NK006(cha)017:378: sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes zhes bya ba 'jam dpal dbyangs
NK006(cha)017:379: blo ldan mchog sred nyid kyis gnubs chen sangs rgyas
NK006(cha)017:380: ye shes la sogs pa'i rje 'bangs grub pa'i tshogs
NK006(cha)017:381: rnams la 'jam dpal zhi khro'i chos skor zab cing
NK006(cha)017:382: rgya che ba mang du spel ba mdzad pa ni
NK006(cha)017:383: phyi ma'i dus na sprul pa'i gter ston chen po
NK006(cha)017:384: rnams kyis rim bzhin gter nas gadanadrangasa ba'i chos bka'
NK006(cha)017:385: mang du mchis pa las mchog tu gyur pa 'di
NK006(cha)017:386: ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis chos
NK006(cha)017:387: rgyal khri srong lde'u btsan dang mtshan ldan yum shel
NK006(cha)017:388: bza' sgron gnyis gdul yul du gzigs nas 'jam dpal
NK006(cha)017:389: rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid la bshad thabs gsum
NK006(cha)017:390: du mdzad // de yang bka' yi 'grel pa la brten nas rgya che ba spyi ti ltar bshad /
NK006(cha)017:391: rgyud la brten nas yang 'grel mdzad /
NK006(cha)017:392: de dag kyang gang zag dbang po'i rim pa gsum
NK006(cha)017:393: gyi dkri tshul du snying por bsdus te gnang ba
NK006(cha)017:394: btsad pos / spa gro rtsal gyi brag sprul nyi
NK006(cha)017:395: ma ris su zla ba gcig gi thugs dam gyis
NK006(cha)017:396: btsad pos / rgyud grol / jo mos stag tshang
NK006(cha)017:397: dpal phug tu lo bdun ye shes kyi sku la
NK006(cha)017:398: thig le sbyangs pas 'pho ba chen po'i sku brnyes
NK006(cha)017:399: nas pad+ma 'od kyi pho brang du gu ru'i drung
NK006(cha)017:400: du phebs gdams pa'i bla dpe rnams ma 'ongs pa'i
NK006(cha)017:401: don du rgyud yang snying ngo sprod btags grol sogs
NK006(cha)017:402: 'kho yi gshin rje gshed dmar po'i thugs ka dang
NK006(cha)017:403: yongs su tshang ba dpal phug rdo ba g.yu phra
NK006(cha)017:404: can gnyis su gu ru rin po ches gter du
NK006(cha)017:405: sbas pas rim bzhin mnga' bdag gi skye ba bco
NK006(cha)017:406: lnga pa gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug dang mtshan
NK006(cha)017:407: ldan shel baza'i rnam 'phrul sar ban ston pa phyogs
NK006(cha)017:408: med gnyis kyis gter nas gdan drang pa'i 'jam dpal
NK006(cha)017:409: rdzogs pa chen po'i chos bka' de nyid dang /
NK006(cha)017:410: gzhan yang lha sras kyi skye mtha' gter ston chen
NK006(cha)017:411: po sangs rgyas gling pa'i gter nas gdan drangs 'jam
NK006(cha)017:412: dpal zab rgya can gyi skor sogs brgyud pa'i bka'
NK006(cha)017:413: srod ji snyed cig 'dus pa lags //
NK006(cha)017:414: de ltar bka' gter gnyis ldan sgrub pa zab mo 'di la /
NK006(cha)017:415: gang sgrub pa ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag chos
NK006(cha)017:416: thams cad 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor du bsgrubs pas
NK006(cha)017:417: longs spyad par bya ba'i yul dang spyod byed bdag
NK006(cha)017:418: nyid lhar shar bas sngags dang phyag rgya ting nge
NK006(cha)017:420: ji ltar sgrub pa mthun pa'i yan lag sgrub gnas
NK006(cha)017:421: mtshan nyid tshang zhing nyer mkho'i yo byad tshang ba
NK006(cha)017:423: rten dang dam rdzas sogs mthun rkyen ma tshang ba med pa dang /
NK006(cha)017:424: gang gis sgrub pa'i blo gzhan rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs
NK006(cha)017:425: shing dam bca' brtan pos le lo dang sgyid lugs
NK006(cha)017:426: sogs kyis zhum pa'i sems 'dor zhing the tshom dang
NK006(cha)017:427: yid gnyis med pa'i nges pa'i shes pa gting tshugs
NK006(cha)017:429: sgrub pa'i dus kyi yan lag sgyu 'phrul rtsa rgyud las //
NK006(cha)017:430: zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam //
NK006(cha)017:431: bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gi //
NK006(cha)017:432: dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub //
NK006(cha)017:434: mos bsgom gyi dbang du byas nas bdun phrag gcig
NK006(cha)017:435: tu rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes las 'byung ba
NK006(cha)017:436: ltar sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang bar bsgrubs pas grub
NK006(cha)017:439: de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis //
NK006(cha)017:440: sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni //
NK006(cha)017:441: ye shes thig le nyid snang ba //
NK006(cha)017:442: bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /
NK006(cha)017:443: phyogs bcu'i dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK006(cha)017:444: zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang //
NK006(cha)017:445: rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang //
NK006(cha)017:446: 'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs /
NK006(cha)017:447: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun //
NK006(cha)017:448: mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang //
NK006(cha)017:449: rgya chen gsung la don phyung pa'ang //
NK006(cha)017:450: mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o //
NK006(cha)017:452: le lo sgyid snyoms med pa yis //
NK006(cha)017:453: the tshom med par bsgrubs byas na //
NK006(cha)017:455: rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa 'thob //
NK006(cha)017:456: zhes gsungs pa ltar pha rol phyin drug rdzogs //
NK006(cha)017:457: sa dang lam gyi rim pa rnams bsgrod nas mthar 'bras ye shes bla ma'i sa thob pa dang /
NK006(cha)017:458: gnas skabs su'ang tshogs sgrub byas pa'i phan yon kyang /
NK006(cha)017:459: sa la 'dzul zhing ri brag la thogs med du 'gro ba dang //
NK006(cha)017:460: lha klu lha ma yin sogs dbang du 'dus //
NK006(cha)017:461: nam mkha' la bya bzhin bgrod //
NK006(cha)017:462: ngag gi dbyangs snyan pa dang //
NK006(cha)017:463: tshig btsan zhing nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang //
NK006(cha)017:464: rgas sra zhing stobs dang ldan pa /
NK006(cha)017:465: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba /
NK006(cha)017:467: rang gzhan gyi gnod pa zhi zhing phrin las rab
NK006(cha)017:468: 'byams la rang dbang 'byor pa sogs phan yon chen
NK006(cha)017:470: spyir sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi mtshan bskal pa
NK006(cha)017:471: mang por brjod pa las rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs
NK006(cha)017:472: kyi mtshan tsam brjod pa phan yon che zhing /
NK006(cha)017:473: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i ngo bo //
NK006(cha)017:474: gsung smra ba'i dbang phyug thugs ye shes sems dpa' ste /
NK006(cha)017:475: mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa thams can kyi ye shes kyi sku gcig tu gyur pa nyid /
NK006(cha)017:476: sngon 'das pa'i dus bde gshegs klu yi rig mog /
NK006(cha)017:477: da lta byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na mos pa rab dag'i rgyal po //
NK006(cha)017:478: ma 'ong pa na rdul bral yang dag bsags kyi
NK006(cha)017:479: zhing khams su mgon po kun tu gzigs sogs sangs
NK006(cha)017:480: rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sogs mtshan dang sku yi rnam 'gyur mtha' yas pa nyid /
NK006(cha)017:481: bla med rdo rje theg pa'i nye lam gyis sgrub
NK006(cha)017:482: pas sangs rgyas byang sems ji snyed cig skad cig
NK006(cha)017:483: cig gis sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /
NK006(cha)017:484: spobs pa'i gter chen po brgyad grol zhing //
NK006(cha)017:485: shes bya thams cad la chags thogs med pa'i shes rab /
NK006(cha)017:491: 'gyur ba med pa'i sku mchog myur du thob pa'i
NK006(cha)017:492: sa bon thebs pa la dga' spro rgya chen po
NK006(cha)017:493: bskyed nas // snang gsal gyi mar me dri ma med pa 'od gsal ba'i brda' 'dis /
NK006(cha)017:494: don rang byung gi ye shes mtshon par byed cing /
NK006(cha)017:495: de yang rten lus kyi kong bur rtsa rlung thig
NK006(cha)017:496: le'i zhun mar la lam bskyed rdzogs kyi sdong bu
NK006(cha)017:497: gtsugs pas / dbyibs sngags chos gsum /
NK006(cha)017:498: yeshesa phyag rgya'i sgron me sbar ba dang /
NK006(cha)017:499: rten a ba d+hu ti'i kong bur /
NK006(cha)017:500: khams dkar dmar rlung dang bcas pa'i zhun mar la
NK006(cha)017:501: gtum mo a thung gi sdong bu btsugs pas lhan
NK006(cha)017:502: skyes ye shes kyi sgron me sbar ba dang /
NK006(cha)017:503: rten kun gzhi klong chen yangs pa'i kong bur //
NK006(cha)017:504: byang chub sems kyi zhun mar la rig pa ye
NK006(cha)017:505: shes kyi sdong bu btsugs pas snang ba bzhi'i sgron
NK006(cha)017:506: me sbar bas srid gsum gyi ma rig pa thams
NK006(cha)017:507: cad 'joms nas ye shes 'od gsal gyi snang ba
NK006(cha)017:508: 'byams klas pa mtha' dang mu med par shar ba
NK006(cha)017:509: dang / gal te tshe 'dir ma grol na bar
NK006(cha)017:510: do chos nyid kyi sgron ma'i 'od la ngo shes
NK006(cha)017:511: rtsal rdzogs brtan pa thob nas grol ba dang /
NK006(cha)017:512: srid pa bar dor 'phyan na yang dpal mgon rtsa
NK006(cha)017:513: ba'i bla ma'i thugs rje'i sgron me 'od kyi snang
NK006(cha)017:514: bas go phyes nas thar ba'i bshul lam snyegs te
NK006(cha)017:515: rang bzhin sprul pa'i zhing du 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
NK006(cha)017:516: ba'i dgos ched sogs phan yon mtha' klas pa dang
NK006(cha)017:518: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
NK006(cha)017:519: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
NK006(cha)017:520: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
NK006(cha)017:521: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
NK006(cha)017:522: ces pa ltar gzhi lam 'bras gsum thams cad snang
NK006(cha)017:523: gsal mar me 'di yis mtshon par byed cing mar
NK006(cha)017:524: me gcig la bltas ba'i rdo rje mched lcam rnams
NK006(cha)017:525: sa mchog 'od gsal rdo rje rtse mor mngon byang
NK006(cha)017:526: chub kyi bar du mi 'bral bar 'grogs shing ston
NK006(cha)017:527: 'khor dgongs pa dbyer med pa'i thugs 'dun dang bcas
NK006(cha)017:528: te mar me'i smon lam gyi rjes zlos gsung bar
NK006(cha)017:529: zhu / ces pa'i stong thun 'di yang kahthoga rgyud
NK006(cha)017:530: sde lha khang du sgrub mchod la nye mkho bas
NK006(cha)017:531: mkhan po bsod nams nas gsung bskul bzhin chos kyi
